text:
Ragnhild Queseth Haarstad (4 April 1939 – 6 June 2017) was a Norwegian politician for the Centre Party. She was born in Grue, Norway. She was Minister of Local Government and Regional Development (Norway) from 1997 through 1999.
Haarstad died on 6 June 2017 in Oslo, Norway at the age of 78.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Local Government and Regional Development (Norway)
